name: Super Treat Boy
description:
Controls:
R- Return to the last checkpoint. For if you get trapped in walls (sorry for the bug)
Movement - WASD and Space bar to Jump
Aim and shoot with mouse once weapons are unlocked. Right click to explode the grenade. Any enemy can be killed with explosions (fires, spike boxes, hangers)
Mouse wheel/Q- Switch items.
CTRL button - Camera Zoom

Story:

Take the role of the intrepid hero, finding the five secret treasures needed to escape the dungeon. Return to the starting chamber with all 5 items in hand and you will win! Collect all of the heroes' favorite treat, the jellybean, along the way for a special surprise!

Hint: If you've collected 4 of the 5 prizes and are stuck on the last one. There is a hidden passage around where you found your second prize.

Music courtesy of:
